Title: Requires that regents and elective officers of the university of the state of New York prove that their primary residence is located within New York state before entering on their duties
Summary: Requires that regents and elective officers of the university of the state of New York prove that their primary residence is located within New York state before entering on their duties.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring that regents and elective officers of the university of the state of New York prove that their primary residence is located within New York state before entering on their duties
